meta.title: Class Fund Management - TTM63
meta.description: Class fund management system for TTM63 - Vimaru

error.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred in the system

desc.404: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved. Please check the URL.
desc.403: You do not have permission to access this page. Please sign in or contact an administrator.
desc.500: The server is experiencing technical issues. We're working to restore service as soon as possible.
desc.default: The system is experiencing temporary issues. Please try again later or contact support.

error.supportInfo: If the error persists, please contact your class representative for support

login.title: Sign in
login.welcomeDesc: Use Google account with email {'@'}st.vimaru.edu.vn to sign in
login.securityDesc: The system uses Google OAuth for strong security and only allows access with school email.

import.title: Import student list
import.description: Import students from Excel/CSV or paste from clipboard with format: STT|MSV|HOTEN

formatGuide.title: Required file format:
formatGuide.line2: ‚Ä¢ 3 columns: STT | MSV | HOTEN or STT | MSV | Full name
formatGuide.line3: ‚Ä¢ Header can be upper or lower case
formatGuide.line4: ‚Ä¢ First row is header, data starts from row 2

clipboard.title: Paste data from clipboard
clipboard.placeholder:
Paste your data here...
Example:
1	94901	Nguyen Van An
2	94902	Tran Thi Binh
3	94903	Le Van Cuong

clipboardGuide.title: Clipboard instructions:
clipboardGuide.line1: ‚Ä¢ Copying from Excel/Google Sheets will be tab-separated
clipboardGuide.line3: ‚Ä¢ Header row can be present or not

validation.orderPositive: Order must be a positive number
